page.title: 02The RAILWAY and INDUSTRY.
page.content: THE RAILWAY came to{Kenilworth}in {1883.}Throughout its hundred year history the line and station have had a{pronounced effect}on the{life of the {town.}Coal usage promoted the{growth of{industry and new business -}for example -{Kenilworth}being a small {farming community}had only two coal merchants until the{Railway opened. This figure rapidly rose to six in only a few short years. Old, {cottage-type industries}common in the mid-nineteenth century such as{comb {makers}were lost to large{brick works and similar industries by the turn of the century.{The line}was at its {heyday}during the two{World Wars}of the{20th century.}By this time there were ten coal merchants in the town and{tourism}had become a{booming {industry. { See page 3................
